mapper.select: SELECT C.*, T.USERNAME FROM CUSTOMER C INNER JOIN TREATMENTCHART T ON C.CUSTOMERNO = T.CUSTOMERNO WHERE C.CUSTOMERNO = #{customerNo}
SELECT H.*, C.WEIGHT, C.GENDER, C.ANIMALNAME FROM HOSPITALIZE H INNER JOIN CUSTOMER C ON H.CUSTOMERNO = C.CUSTOMERNO WHERE H.STATE=1
SELECT H.*, C.WEIGHT, C.GENDER, C.ANIMALNAME FROM HOSPITALIZE H INNER JOIN CUSTOMER C ON H.CUSTOMERNO = C.CUSTOMERNO WHERE H.HISTORYNO=#{historyNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE HOSPITALIZE SET CAGENO=#{cageNo}, DISEASE=#{disease}, STARTDATE=#{startDate}, LASTDATE=#{lastDate} WHERE HISTORYNO=#{historyNo}
UPDATE HOSPITALIZE SET STATE=0, LASTDATE=NOW() WHERE HISTORYNO=#{historyNo}
